Whenever another historic permanent you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each Artificer you control.

Create two 1/1 red Shapeshifter tokens with changeling. [i](They have every creature type.)[/i]

This spell can't be countered
Other creatures you control have hexproof.

Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
